author: freep.com
title: Red Wings at Oilers game day: Time, TV, radio info
text:
MORE Tonight's game information
Detroit Red Wings (3-2-0) at Edmonton Oilers (2-4-0)
When: 9:30 p.m.
Where: Rexall Place, Edmonton.
TV: Fox Sports Detroit.
Radio: 97.1 FM in Detroit. ( List of Red Wings' radio affiliates )
Game notes: This is the beginning of a 3-game West Canada road trip that will continue with the Calgary Flames and Vancouver Canucks. ... The Oilers are 2-4, but have won their past two games against Calgary and Vancouver. ... 18-year-old Connor McDavid, the Oilers' No. 1 overall pick in 2015, has three goals and two assists in the young season. ... the Red Wings used the early-week break to slow down and work on special teams. ... Detroit started the season with three consecutive wins, but has since lost two straight.
